name: Dirt Bike Racer ( 3D Offroad Motorcycle Racing Games )
name_original: Dirt Bike Racer ( 3D Offroad Motorcycle Racing Games )
description:
Go ahead and live out your motorcycle racing dreams with Dirt Bike Racer !!!

Ride your dirt bike on unusually challenging obstacle courses and try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline action-packed, heart-thumping bike game.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
